summary: THERE CRACKS ON MY DASH...AFTER LOOKING AROUND THE INTERNET , THIS A BIG PROBLEM..I CALLED GM, AND THE REP TOLD ME THAT THEY WHERE NOT GOING TO FIX IT AT THIS TIME SO I ASKED WHEN WILL A GOOD TIME BE. THEY REFUSED TO FIX IT AND MY VEHICLE IS STILL UNDER WARRANTY.IF THIS AIR BAG DEPLOYS IT IS GOING TO CAUSE SOME SERIOUS DAMAGE OR DEATH TO SOMEONE, THIS NEEDS TO BE A MANDATORY RECALL.
